attributes.action: introduce legislation to strengthen the data protection act, specifically to ensure that Government departments must only share citizen's data having obtained explicit permission for each exchange.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The computerisation of Government departments is inevitable, but the free access to data on private citizens across departmental boundaries is not. Especially with health data.  On every occasion, such data exchanges MUST be covered by an explicit permit (or warrant), including acceptance by the individual concerned.  Please sign and demand this basic human right of privacy.
